cloudant.runview.view.prompt:
Ok.  Tell me the view you would like to run.  Enter it as *design:view*.
Use *cloudant list views [database]* to see a full list of views.
cloudant.runview.noview: You didn't enter a view name.  We will stop now.
cloudant.runview.keys.prompt:
Ok. Please enter the keys you would like to use to run the *%s* view.
You can enter a list of keys separated by a comma and spaces.
For example, you could enter *Smith, Johnson, Brown*.
You can provide no keys by entering *%s* or you can terminate by entering *%s*.
